# UI TripleD

> Production-ready UI components, blocks, and pages built on top of shadcn/ui and Framer Motion.

**Last Updated:** 2026-01-06T01:40:33.089Z

## Table of Contents

- Components (76 items)
- Blocks (70 items)
- Pages (16 items)

### Components

- [Cinema Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cinema-ticket-baseui): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode (Base UI)
- [Cinema Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cinema-ticket-shadcnui): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode
- [Conference Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/conference-ticket-baseui): Animated conference ticket with glassmorphism effects and holographic details (Base UI)
- [Conference Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/conference-ticket-shadcnui): Animated conference ticket with glassmorphism effects and holographic details
- [Theater Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/theater-ticket-baseui): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode (Base UI)
- [Theater Ticket](https://ui.tripled.work/components/theater-ticket-shadcnui): Cinematic theater ticket with rip effect and barcode

- [Browse Folder](https://ui.tripled.work/components/browse-folder-baseui): Folder browser with animated tabs and content (Base UI)
- [Browse Folder](https://ui.tripled.work/components/browse-folder-shadcnui): Folder browser with animated tabs and content
- [Currency Converter Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/currency-converter-card-baseui): Finance conversion widget with animated inputs, simulated exchange updates, and contextual feedback (Base UI)
- [Currency Converter Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/currency-converter-card-shadcnui): Finance conversion widget with animated inputs, simulated exchange updates, and contextual feedback
- [Glassmorphism Statistics Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-statistics-card-baseui): Interactive statistics card with hover reveal and smooth transitions (Base UI)
- [Glassmorphism Statistics Card](https://ui.tripled.work/components/glassmorphism-statistics-card-shadcnui): Interactive statistics card with hover reveal and smooth transitions
- [Projects Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/projects-block-baseui): Animated project card with hover effects, image zoom, and link buttons (Base UI)
- [Projects Block](https://ui.tripled.work/components/projects-block-shadcnui): Animated project card with hover effects, image zoom, and link buttons

- [Native Avatar Expand](https://ui.tripled.work/components/native-avatar-expand): Avatar component that expands to reveal the name on click with smooth animations.

- [Native Badge](https://ui.tripled.work/components/native-badge): Animated badge component with glass, glow, and outline variants for native feel.
- [Native Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/native-button): Glassmorphism-inspired button component based on shadcn/ui with smooth animations and modern styling

- [Native Button](https://ui.tripled.work/components/native-button-shadcnui): Glassmorphism-inspired button component based on shadcn/ui with smooth animations and modern styling

- [Native Delete](https://ui.tripled.work/components/native-delete-shadcnui): Delete button that expands to show a confirmation button with smooth animations.

- [Native Follow Cursor](https://ui.tripled.work/components/native-follow-cursor): Label that smoothly follows the cursor with spring physics and customizable variants.

### Pages

#### Page

- [CTA Banner Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cta-banner-section-baseui): Animated call-to-action banner with gradient background and button animations (Base UI)
- [CTA Banner Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/cta-banner-section-shadcnui): Animated call-to-action banner with gradient background and button animations

- [FAQ Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/faq-section-shadcnui): Animated FAQ section with expandable questions and smooth transitions
- [Feature Grid Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/feature-grid-section-baseui): Animated feature grid with staggered card animations and icon reveals (Base UI)
- [Feature Grid Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/feature-grid-section-shadcnui): Animated feature grid with staggered card animations and icon reveals

- [Pricing Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/pricing-section-shadcnui): Animated pricing cards with hover effects and feature lists

- [Scroll Reveal](https://ui.tripled.work/components/scroll-reveal-shadcnui): Section that animates into view on scroll with intersection observer
- [Stats Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/stats-section-baseui): Animated statistics section with cards and counters (Base UI)
- [Stats Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/stats-section-shadcnui): Animated statistics section with cards and counters
- [Testimonial Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/testimonial-section-baseui): Carousel-style testimonial section with smooth transitions (Base UI)
- [Testimonial Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/testimonial-section-shadcnui): Carousel-style testimonial section with smooth transitions

##### Hero

- [Hero Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/hero-section-baseui): Hero section with staggered text and button reveal (Base UI)
- [Hero Section](https://ui.tripled.work/components/hero-section-shadcnui): Hero section with staggered text and button reveal
